question.title: Fix Product Name Format
question.metaData:
{"mysql":["Create table If Not Exists Sales (sale_id int, product_name varchar(30), sale_date date)
"],"mssql":["Create table Sales (sale_id int, product_name varchar(30), sale_date date)
"],"oraclesql":["Create table Sales (sale_id int, product_name varchar(30), sale_date date)
","ALTER SESSION SET nls_date_format='YYYY-MM-DD'
"],"database":true,"name":"fix_name_format","pythondata":["Sales = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['sale_id', 'product_name', 'sale_date']).astype({'sale_id':'Int64', 'product_name':'object', 'sale_date':'datetime64[ns]'})"],"database_schema":{"Sales":{"sale_id":"INT","product_name":"VARCHAR(30)","sale_date":"DATE"}}}
